data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Some South Asian DJs, especially in America, have mixed Punjabi folk music with house, reggae, and hip-hop to add a different flavor to Punjabi folk. These ____ continued ____ gain ____ as ____ 1990s ____ to ____ end. This ____ was ____ and ____ by DJs such ____ Punjabi MC and DJ Rekha. DJ Rekha, ____ from ____ UK, now ____ in New York City running a club ____ series ____ Basement Bhangra. These monthly events exhibit house and hip hop bhangra remixes.
data.partBlankContent: Some South Asian DJs, especially in America, have mixed Punjabi folk music with house, reggae, and hip-hop to add a different flavor to Punjabi folk. These rem____ continued t_ gain popul_____ as t__ 1990s ca__ to a_ end. This move____ was estab______ and prolif______ by DJs such a_ Punjabi MC and DJ Rekha. DJ Rekha, origi_____ from t__ UK, now res____ in New York City running a club ev___ series cal___ Basement Bhangra. These monthly events exhibit house and hip hop bhangra remixes.
data.answer: 一些南亚的dj，尤其是在美国，将旁遮普民族音乐与house、reggae和hip-hop混合在一起，为旁遮普民族增添了不同的风味。随着20世纪90年代的结束，这些混音的数量继续增加。这个运动是由旁遮普MC和DJ Rekha等DJ建立和发展起来的。来自英国的DJ Rekha现在居住在纽约，经营一个名为地下室邦格拉的俱乐部系列活动。这些每月的活动展示house和嘻哈bhangra混音。
